plugin.name: Vanilla UI
plugin.description: Select this if you don't use any custom UI but instead just use the vanilla UI. This will load in some xml files that overwrite vanilla UI files and allows for navigating UI elements with keyboard keys or a gamepad.

plugin.name: Base DarN UI
plugin.description:
Select this if you use the DarNified UI by DarN himself. This will load in some xml files that overwrite his UI files and allows for navigating UI elements with keyboard keys or a gamepad.
Note: This install currently does not support classic inventory or alternate level-up menus!

plugin.name: Dark DarN UI
plugin.description: Select this if you use the dark version of DarNified UI submitted by Gothic251. This will load in some xml files that overwrite those UI files and allows for navigating UI elements with keyboard keys or a gamepad.
